common_1075_botan_01: The second research station! About time, too.[VAR 0114(0008)]
common_1075_rival_01: Phew! Let’s... Let’s head in and...take a breather...[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_1075_friend_01:
I thought you’d have a bit more stamina, student
council girl.[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_1075_rival_02: Heh heh... Hoo... I’m just full of surprises![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_1075_friend_02: That wasn’t a compliment, you know...[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_1075_botan_02a:
Hey, look—a Jigglypuff! It’s good to see some
nice, familiar Pokémon down here too.[VAR 0114(0008)]
common_1075_botan_02b:
Hey, look—a Delibird! It’s good to see some
nice, familiar Pokémon down here too.[VAR 0114(0008)]
common_1075_botan_06:
Seriously, what WAS that? Darn thing scared me
half to death...[VAR 0114(0008)]
common_1075_rival_03a:
It was definitely kinda...ferocious for a Jigglypuff,
wasn’t it?[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_1075_rival_03b:
It was definitely kinda...mechanical-looking for
a Delibird, wasn’t it?[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_1075_botan_07:
Come on, let’s get inside already. One more
jump scare like that and I’m done for...[VAR 0114(0008)]
